text: The Mayor shall not register a motor vehicle that is subject to the provisions of this chapter if the motor vehicle does not comply with this chapter, or any rule promulgated under this chapter.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Prohibition on registering motor vehicles not in compliance.
